sentences.sContent: They spoke good Spanish, and promised to interpret for me.
sentences.sCn: 他们西班牙语说得很好，答应替我翻译。

sentences.sContent: ...How does the woman interpret the fact that the man was asked to help his colleagues with their work...
...The data is harder to interpret than I expected...
...There are two ways to interpret Plutarch when he suggests that a critic should be able to produce "a better in its place...
...All the traditional reasons put forward to interpret the pay gap--that women fall behind when they leave the workforce to raise kids...
...The data is hard to interpret than I expected...

remMethod.val: inter(在…之间) ＋ pret → 在两种语言中间说 → 口译

words.tran: 可说明的；可判断的；可翻译的

trans.tranCn: 解释， 说明； 口译
trans.tranOther: to translate spoken words from one language into another
